short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Product Hunt Extension: Automate routine activities on producthunt.com and Take number #1 rank üèÜ

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By using the extension, you can increase your chances of getting into the top products. It will also help you grow your customer network without a lot of effort. Additionally, our automation feature allows you to streamline your routine activities on Product Hunt:

1. Grow your list of followers
2. Clear your follower list
3. Parse user details to contact with them
4. Parse and export details about new products
5. Create notes for future articles and be more proactive

üìà Increase your chances of getting into the top products, and increase customer acquisition.
